channel.title: Making World Map button open teleport interface

item.title: Making World Map button open teleport interface
item.dc:creator: @gwinter gwinter
item.description:
@gwinter wrote:

Hi, I want to make it so that when I click on my ‘World Map’ button, its opens up the minimap interface with all of the city teleports on it, but I just cant seem to figure it out. Currently the city teleport is a teleport in the mage book. Heres my files:
world map button in client.java on client side:

} if(l == 1050) {//world map if(openInterfaceID != 26200) pushMessage("Taverly teleport is currently unavailable.", 0, "");

here is the current tele in clickingbuttons.java server sided:

case 6005: c.getPA().showInterface(26200); c.sendMessage("Taverly map data is currently not working, sorry");

Read full topic
item.source: Making World Map button open teleport interface
